name: Der Blutharsch
description: '''Der Blutharsch''' was an [[Austria|Austrian]] music project founded in 1996 by Albin Julius. Initially associated with [[martial industrial]], [[dark ambient]] and [[neofolk]], the project later shifted toward [[Psychedelic rock|psychedelic]] and [[experimental rock]]. Its sound evolved from atmospheric compositions to a more band-oriented style, and in 2010 it was renamed Der Blutharsch and the Infinite Church of the Leading Hand. Julius led the project until his death on 4 May 2022.
